title: Japanese Karaoke, but I cant sing..

comments.comment: Vlogging for humans that live more private lives can be dangerous, but Felix found a way to allow us to live through his shows without it feeling intrusive to his life. These vlogs are aesthetically pleasing adventures that don't feel as forced. I hope He continues to bring us this content without feeling like he HAS to.
He's practically retired but he still takes the time to put together videos for everyone glad he got where he's at.
Felix doesn't realize how much the glasses make him look like his father. Also I would love to see his character sheet. One of my favorite things in D&D is just making characters.

Marzia's editing in these is top-notch.  

I feel like a broken record by now but I'm just really happy for you man. You seem much more content and peaceful. Really loving these videos lately. It's nice to get a little glimpse into your life in Japan, and getting to see a softer, more calm, side of you is refreshing. ️
I never thought we'd get the surfer PewDiePie arc, especially moving to Japan, but I'm here for it.
More so than ever now, I find myself wishing Marzia was still doing content as I would love to see her fashion evolution whilst living in Japan. I totally understand her decision - I just miss her <3
His Japan vlogs are so blissful to watch. They make me so happy. It inspired me to sign up for a Japanese class. Their relationship is so cute to watch!

It's like, when you're living an extremely shitty life with no hopes of anything getting better, vlogs like these remind me that no, there are things in life worth living for, worth fighting for. Thank you pewds, these vlogs really keep me going
The fact that the restaurant remembered the last time Pewdiepie went there was really wholesome and sweet.
I love these vlogs so much, not just Pewds and Marzia but the fact that I still can't go visit Japan rn, I am willing to settle for these vlogs at the meantime.
The fact that the staff in that restaurant remembered you guys from 4 years ago has to be a sign of a good restaurant
so inspiring to see Felix as this wise, sucessful,  grown ass man he became

I love the fact that Pewds is showing us Japan and he's enjoying it. Me and my parents are very curious about Japan (I''m planning to visit it soon) and we find these videos super interesting because they shows us different perspectives about a country that is so different from any other. Keep up the great work Pewds, wish you all the best!

hi pewds, not sure if you know but the headaches while surfing are from the sun! the water reflects the light making it brighter which can put strain on your eyes causing headaches or even blindness(rare)! wearing sunglasses, especially reflective ones, will help a lot! Climbers have the same problem when the reach summits and the sun is beaming down. Just thought I would share <3

the number of times you say "happy" in all your Japan vlogs really takes the point across that the long wait, money, and effort put into this move is all worth it! really happy for you guys and love the vlogs so far. it's lighting up my will again to do all that is necessary so i can one day move to Japan too. currently, i'm taking my n4 classes 3x a week. baby steps
11:19 すごい滑らかな日本語、上手くてびっくりした
I never thought that this would be how Felix would end up as but Im glad he did he is happy and Im glad hopefully more fun adventures in japan soon
There is something so wholesome about seeing a young couple who managed to fulfill their dream together and are now living their best lives! I'm so happy for them :)
This guy is living the dream. Taking care of his health, going on adventures, no stress about money, or shelter, have a great partner. Good job, man! May we all get to live the dream someday! :)

My dog recently got diagnosed with cancer and now as up to 8 weeks left and seeing pewds and marzia taking such good care of their dogs puts tears in my eyes. Never forget to love and take care of your pets before it eventually becomes too late

I actually like that karaoke scene was just one clip. He was having fun with friends and felt like sharing that clip. I like these vlogs 'cause they feel very low effort in the best way possible. Not forced at all.
Seeing Joey and Aki in Felix vlogs is like my favorite crossover. Can’t wait for Felix to be a guest in Trash Taste podcast!
The vibes in pewds’ vlogs these days are on POINT
Being Japanese, I really enjoy seeing your transition living here. As an ex-surfer, I totally recommend you get a portable pump shower. You can shower off the sand and sea salt.
This japan vlogs never disappoints me. Glad he's really really enjoying his live outside YouTube.. Much love Felix!

my son just moved to Japan! hes in the military so i appreciate pewds for doing these videos! its exciting to see some of the things he can enjoy. i also want yo visit one day. im so happy for him and his wife for being able to find thier happiness and live out their dream! awesome content pewds! i love the evolution!️

Once again, this was so relaxing to watch. it feels like a treat. 
i'm so glad this is what Pewdiepie is doing now. Every video he has made since he moved to japan are an absolute bliss.

I'm so surprised and happy that you sang let down at 16:07
Such an underrated song

Felix: Decides to leave Europe to explore different cultures

Also Felix: Moves to Japan to explore European homes
9:14 "Yamate cho" So cute  Tbh his Japanese is very natural and soft exactly the way a Japanese person would speak
i look forward to these vlogs

I had to stop half way through and take a second to thank you Felix for allowing us to come with you on all your trips! For someone who will probably never be able to go to Japan, being able to see all these things is just so breath taking beautiful. Thank you.

I'll wait for next video "Japanese Karaoke but I can now sing in Japanese". Also it's great to see Felix doing what he wants and enjoying it as we all see. Just keep smiling my dude, it lightens up my day
His vlogs still emit the same vibes as his old ones. Never change Pewds we love you!
Watching Pewds for almost 9 yrs now and I cant feel but glad to see him living peacefully

As an Aussie surfer I love that you wear your rashie in the car... real Kook vibes... but it is brilliant, dont change mate!
On a serious note - im glad you commited to the larger waves - the hardest part in moving from beginner to intermediate in surfing is commiting to larger waves and going out to the back and waiting to get crushed over and over

I can't put into words how much I appreciate the current contents and the laid back, chill atmosphere in this community. Truly proud to be part of this wonderful community. I feel like I've grown to be a better person along with Felix. And glad that my childhood hero is still relatable to my current state of life.
These Vlogs have actually been some of my favourite content, I feel like there's so much forced stuff on YouTube it's nice to get something relaxing and real while also entertaining
I just want to appreciate Marzia's editing. You are killing it.
This felt so genuine and peaceful, like spending a day with an old friend. Thank you Felix
I am seriously addicted to these Japan Vlogs, Loved it mate and love the fact that Pewds is having fun in Japan as well <3
i can’t stress enough how cute and chill these lil vlogs are.
i never knew i could feel this happy for another person. love you pewds

there are thousands of other people saying the same thing, but I want to say it too:
it brings me a great amount of joy to see you both so calm and relaxed and especially happy in these vlogs recently! 
I'm so glad that this life works out for you guys :D
really glad felix is enjoying his life right now, cant help but feel happy for him
I Love that Felix is a Radiohead fan. Both Felix and Radiohead has influenced me so much in life. To hear him sing Let down just made me very happy.

These vlogs are soo soothing and relaxing! Love the editing and the music choices :D Thank you so much for this 30min glimpse into your life in Japan. Thank you Marzia and Felix! I can't believe it is 2022, I am almost 36 years old and I am watching PewDiePie :D
I like how Felix finds the butt detective but Marzia will always manage to find the most cursed item.  I miss the cursed creations.
Also thank you Marzia for editing these every single one is absolutely perfect.
16:34 lord, for a second I thought it was Marzia making that noise
This guy is obviously living his best life now! Happy for him.

Yotsubato is a GREAT manga for beginner Japanese language leaners because Yotsuba's dialogue is all in hiragana while the older kids and adults use more kanji (with furigana), and the story is super sweet and wholesome (so far at least - i havent finished the series yet). Basically the benefit of reading a children's book without the children's book story.
The contrast between Felix struggling in the waves and Edgar enjoying watermelon is hilarious

This whole chapter of Felix ''post drinking'' and now in Japan makes me so happy seeing him happy. I never envied someone so much, everytime I'm almost crying tears  of joy (and when I watch the wedding video its niagara falls in my room) Amazing, I learned english watching Felix pretty much, back in 2012-2013. I'm so happy. This is the best youtube experience. Absolutely amazing Felix. Let's goooo

this series brings such a dumb smile to my face. I love seeing the hidden beauty of Japan's organized industrial architecture, the little oddities here and there alongside you guys enjoying your well earned dream.
thank you felix and martzia for sharing your adventures, as always

These vlog type videos that Felix makes and Marzia edits are soooo satisfying to watch, I feel like I'm vicariously living life through Felix lol... Experiencing all these new things in Japan through these videos! I love how chill they are, Marzia gets it! She's so good at this, I hope they never end! love you both so much!
Marzia has such an adorable sense of fashion. She's an angel, so she's perfect.
I really love the chill vibe of you VLOGS, the music compliments them perfectly.  You both seem so much happier than when you were living here in the UK.

I must say i never really watched pewdiepie's videos but since he moved to japan and started vlogging i watched every vlog because i am really interestet in japan and this just shows how great it can be to try new things.
so pls keep up the good work I really enjoy your volgs felix

I wanted to say thank you, because due to these amazing blogs, Pewds inspired me to get back into surfing again. I loved it in the past but was too buzy because of studies, and after graduation i locked myself up because of a burnout. But the was he casually mentiones reading books, exercising, surfing somehow works really well to motivate to also try so.
I think this is my favourite era of Pewdiepie and I’ve been watching since I was a kid! These Japan vlogs are always an amazing surprise
These vlogs are so relaxing and a joy to watch. Hope they keep making them, the editing and music makes it even more soothing. Props to Marzia for putting it all together so well!

Hey pewds long time fan, just to say Thankyou for the Vlogs love them and I showed my mum your first Japan one now she always asks for your next one and we watch them together and tonight my dad joined too. Thanks for bringing my family together
7:39 the rain with the city scenery is such an awesome vibe
This old school camera effect makes these vlogs even more relaxed and chill, fantastic choice!
i looove these vlogs .. perfect editing .. perfect scenery .. .. i can't have enough of them
Hey Pewds, just wanna say congrats on having a video with 4k. Japan seems so fun and I just really appreciate these vids because they're just so chill and calming
I can relate to pewdiepie so much.. how chill, just trying to relax after years of hard work. His videos really are calming!
In love with these vlogs. Honestly it makes me so happy to see pewds and marzia thriving in japan ️️
Thank you Felix and Marzia for sharing the beauty of Japan to the whole world!
The incredible memories these two will have when their old with so much more to come. Man, what a life

I used to watch PewDiePie as a very young child. Maybe when I was like 6 or something like that. I recently turned 16 and I just thought randomly "I wonder what pewdiepie is doing right now" so I come to his channel and see this. For some reason it made me a little emotional and I think he lives in japan now, I could be wrong. BUT Seeing him grown up and moved/living in another place is really cool. Goodluck PewDiePie!

This is my favorite Pewdiepie Era ️️️

Just feels so wholesome and authentic and ahhhhh I love it
I'm glad I'm watching his vlogs, just incase I failed to go in Japan in the future at least I got to see its beauty just by this vlogs. Thank you Felix for this and all of it. This is just too good

We all say it every single vlog, but these videos are just so wholesome and almost have a nostalgic feeling about them.

Seeing him enjoying the rewards from all of his years on YouTube by living in his dream country with his house and wife is just amazing. A lot of us began watching as children, continued as teenagers and are now adults (I'm 20), I don't even really enjoy vlogs or gaming videos anymore but these vlogs are great to see, it's like watching someone who's retired and is simply enjoying their success. Hope you continue to have a great time out there! <3

Marzia is such a versatile editor. She does everything in this vid so, so well! I never really watched her content, so I didn’t know what kind of editing she does, but then I remembered brad and sive both got caught with their pants down when a quality video came from Marzia, lol. Great video, as always!
I miss Japan more because of this vlog. I hope it opens up for tourist so we can go before end of this year
SO MANY CARTUBERS IN JAPAN (English-Speaking). I’m sure they’d all love to help you out with a skyline, you can experience a whole new Japan through the car culture, those videos WOULD BE INSANE
Really like the new frames . That onigiri looked so tasty too. Loving the Japan vlogs. Thanks pewds & marzia for your amazing editing

Can we just appreciate that Pewds goes out of his way to film and give insights into his life, maintaining a connection with his massive fan base. The vlogs are high quality and fun to watch, and they have the PEWDIEPIE authenticity and style to them. Thank you! Brofist
This is why I love Japan, they have some of the most craziest things you can go and see
These vlogs bring me so much joy. It’s so great seeing you and Marzia and the pups live your best lives 🥹

You’re so much happier!! It’s clear in your body language. I’m so happy for you finally living your dream! LOVE these videos showing us your life and trusting us with your seeing your private life instead of watching vids in the saaame room for years haha. More please:)!!!

Thanks for the nice vlogs from your life in Japan. I can watch it while I'm stuck in Macau because of the government counter COVID measures, making people here not convenient to travel out as you will need to quarantine when you come back. So have been 2 years I didn't go back to my home country and really enjoying your Japan updates.
BTW, you're staring putting kanji on the titles blocks in the vid, nice move!!!
I am Japanese.  The one-piece figure can be removed by entwining it with the rubber in front of it many times.  Or ask the store clerk and they will tell you how to do it!
It honestly makes me happy to see pweds doing things he love
This vlog series honestly feels like an anime, the vibe and atmosphere and all that. Absolutely love it

Dude, these vlogs and this guy's smile puts a smile on my face. I don't even know, it just radiates happy energy, you know? Crazy long journey till we got here with Pewds/Felix but it's still fun watching his videos man
I really enjoy watching your Japan vlogs, Pewds. They never disappoint!
One of the Best vlogs of this Series. I love these vlogs so much. It calms and relaxes my mind, also seeing both of you happy makes it more enjoying. Love ya Felix
When I used to hear about Japan huge buildings used to came in my mind but it's full of natural beauty too. What a beautiful country man
These vlogs are just so wholesome, it’s nice seeing Felix do things he enjoys outside of YouTube, it’s really heartwarming

I just love this vlogs so much! And loving to see Marzia appearing more often! You guys should do a Q&A together, about the move, your life in japan, it's been so long since we've seen content of you two together. It makes me happy to see you guys living life to the fullest, you deserve it. Lots of love.
the fact that the restaurant owner remembered you is so sweet!

1:58 It really is beautiful.
I got lucky and went to Japan 3 years ago and went there and seeing it in person is surreal

These vlogs make me feel so much better I love their vibe and the energy they give me is insane, thank you for sharing all this with us 
By the way the new glasses look great
I like the chill vibe of these videos you made recently. Happy to see you having a good time in Japan.
You have no idea how much I love these videos. Been following since 2013, watching off and on but I have made sure to watch every single one of these vlogs.
6:51 No matter how many times Felix wear glasses I'll always get reminded of Zeke Jeager
The style of your japan videos is so relaxing, thank you!
I've been sick this whole week and still feeling ill, but this vlog made me forget about it for a while! I can't describe how happy I'm for them
Your vlogs are the best.  Right now I'm experiencing a lot of stress but these videos' calming nature helps me relax.
these have been so fulfilling to watch, love you bro, happy for you
18:02 perfect timing of MONCH MONCH MONCH , so cuteee
You're so happy and nice you're really enjoying Japan and I'm glad! Thank you Felix ️
So beautiful! I can't wait for the day I can visit Japan and see all the beauty in person. Thank you for showing us around through these vlogs! ️️

He may not be most subscribed, but he definitely most entertaining and just good vibes man

imma watch and sleep happy tonight peace y'all
Japan what a beautiful country, I really enjoyed every second of this video I love it
Can't say that I'm not jealous of this. Driving a Tesla around Tokyo, singing karaoke with the Anime Man and Aki, and just living a happy fulfilling life. Can't beat that.

I'm so happy for them, theyre living the dream of being alive, not being worried about much (not assuming they dont have anything to be busy with but the vlogs shows it this way) i would love to be like you felix one day you're such an inspiration i'm so happy for u and hope your life continues to be this way much love <3
I love these Japan vlogs so much

holy crap I never imagined id see Pewds sing Radiohead!!! love it lol

These Japan vlogs have been an incredible breath of fresh and calming air.
19:56 I can just hear Momotaro screaming about a festival
I love tha fact the pewds is giving us so much variety in his videos... And he is actually having fun vlogging and not vlogging for the sake of vlogging. Feels like I am also on a trip to Japan.
Damn… japan is simply amazing… really glad you could share these yo us!!!
Felix being in one of Connor's Crane Machine videos needs to happen after seeing him trying in this video. Would be hilarious to see these two men trying their luck at rigged machines LOL

Before my grandfather passed away when we’re talking about overseas travel, I remember he told my family that we should at least visit Japan once.

At that time I was just curious why, and understand it completely when I visited Japan for a few times a couple years ago before the pandemic. It’s a really beautiful country, so many things to see and interact with, the food are just on another level and so many unique things that we’ll never experience anywhere else.

Hopefully things will get better soon so we can visit Japan again, watching Pewds videos made me miss Japan a lot!
It’s good to see you so at peace. I’ve been loving every Japan vlog
this was refreshing and relaxing. So glad to see you guys happy (:
Loving these vlogs! Thank you for sharing these moments
